properties.name: CU Denver
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258

properties.name: Cherry Creek Mall
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258 Cherry Creek MallGreat Shopping and food.

properties.name: Cherry Creek North
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258Cherry Creek NorthAwesome Food, Shopping, and plenty of places to shop. Best place to take a date!

properties.name: Christine's Apartment - 40 Ogden St.
properties.description: Posted by Ajv25840 Ogden, Denver, CoJust North of Washington Park. Just South West of Downtown Denver.

properties.name: DU (Denver University
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258Private school.

properties.name: Downtown Denver
properties.description: Posted by Ajv25816th Street Mall has a free mall ride all day and until late at night. The way to get around in downtown.

properties.name: Gaylord St. Bars and Restaurants
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258This is the DU hangout on Thursday nights. Fun bars and food. Always a good place to get a drink! Has it all. Hemmingway\'s has 2lbs of crab for 5 bucks on Tuesdays. I have eaten my fair share of their crab!

properties.name: My apartment
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258560 s. dahlia cir. denver, co 80246This is my apartment. I am just south east of downtown denver. Basically next to Cherry Creek Mall and Village.

properties.name: My work
properties.description: Posted by Ajv2581700 Lincoln st., denver, coI am located on the 15th Floor. Some people, including me, call it the "Cash Register Building" because it looks like an old cash register. I am dangerously close to the unlimited restaurants and happy hour spots. I think my beer belly grew a little just thinking about those places.

properties.name: Ogden St. South Bar
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258Not the nicest place to go, but super cheap drinks and food. We walk there from Christines\'s place to Ogden St. South after work if we want a beer, dinner, and a place to hang out.

properties.name: Rooftop Bars and Real World House
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258Tavern Downtown, Lodos, and Real World House. There are so many more bars I could name but these are the better. These places, especially Tavern Downtown has a great rooftop deck that overlooks Coorsfield (Baseball if you are Blonde). This place is becoming a new hotspot because they pimped it out with flat tv\'s, leather goods, and the real worlders are shaking up across the street. They are filming all summer. I am working on getting an elbow or shoe on camera. Everyone needs there 2 secs of fame. Some dudes are more ambitious and wanna score a butt cheek or something. I guess they hears the real world girls are hot. Unverified....

properties.name: Sam's Club, Kmart, Albertons, More Food, yadda, yadda.
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258 Bunch of places to shop. The Sam\'s Club sells booze and it is freakin Cheap. Love it!

properties.name: Super Target
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258Super Targe, 24 Hour Fitness and the New Sports Authority Store.

properties.name: Trendy, Upscale Bars
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258Hush, Monarch, Spill, Mynt, 5 degrees, Martini Ranch. Sure to find short skirts and drunk, high maintenance chicks in this area. God Bless America!

properties.name: Washington Park
properties.description: Posted by Ajv258Hip place to live. People usually rent houses or older apartments. Mostly 20 somethings that are in school or have recently graduated and are young professionals. Running here in the mornings, evenings, and weekends is like a beauty contest. Rarrr! Plenty of great places to eat and small bars to visit close by. (Food- Thai, sushi, Lebanese, Mexican, American, greek).
